benchmark_details.name: PARADISE (Procedural Warnings and Tips Dataset)
benchmark_details.overview: PARADISE is an abducive reasoning task using Q&A format on practical procedural text sourced from wikiHow, focusing on warning and tip inference tasks associated with goals.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the implicit planning skills of language models through warning and tip inference tasks.

data.annotation: Expert annotation, with validation to ensure relevance and appropriateness for reasoning tasks.

methodology.calculation: Standard metrics calculated based on model predictions against provided correct answers.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance in reasoning tasks.
methodology.baseline_results: Human performance: 94% accuracy; Fine-tuned models show varying accuracies, with DeBERTa achieving the highest.
methodology.validation: Extensive testing validated through expert-reviewed annotation.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Complies with Creative Commons licensing for wikiHow content.
